metadata.name: Vinland Saga
metadata.description_text: English translation of Vinland Saga (ヴィンランド・サガ).Vinland Saga is the first series from Kodansha Comics USA to be released in hardcovers, each collection collects and translates two volumes of the original Japanese manga
